actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1819 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make loans under certain circumstances to veterans for the acquisition of lots on which to place mobile homes owned by such veterans.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make loans to veterans for the acquisition of lots on which to place mobile homes owned by such veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1819 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make loans under certain circumstances to veterans for the acquisition of lots on which to place mobile homes owned by such veterans.
